metadata.title: CVE-2023-41056 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. Redis incorrectlyhandles resizing of memory buffers which can result in integer overflowthat leads to heap overflow and potential remote code execution. This issuehas been patched in version 7.0.15 and 7.2.4.

criterions.comment: redis package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
